tagline: Cursor for writing
description: Maybe the strongest AI text editor ðŸ†“ FREE Access to DeepSeek R1, Gemini 2.5 Pro, Claude 3.7 Sonnet, OpenAI o3-mini.. along with Web Search, MCP, Voice Input, Memory, Prompt Management... ðŸŽ¤ Built for Expression - Coherent. Customized. Collaborative.

name: Subscription Day
tagline: Track your paid subscriptions at Menu Bar
description: All your paid subscriptions in one place. Track monthly, annual, trial, and oneâ€‘time payments with a unique, minimalist menu bar calendar featuring multiâ€‘currency support and insightful statisticsâ€”all at a glance.

name: OctoComics
tagline: AI Comic Creation Platform includes generator and community
description: OctoComics is AI-powerd comic generator and community, supports BL comics, serialized comics, OC character comics, etc. With excellent AI model helps users quickly generate script storyboards, characters and images. User can also upload story or character.

name: Keyword Research Tool
tagline: Quickly research keywords with no sign ups or payments
description: No more guesswork - only actionable insights with our keyword research tool. Discover what your audience is searching for, see trend patterns and get essential insights. Try it for free - No cost, no sign-ups.

name: Nonillion
tagline: Immersive meetings with automation in pixel-virtual offices
description: Tired of chaotic meetings where everyone talks over each other? Nonilion recreates real-life collaboration, making conversations natural, productive, and seamless. Host meetups, meetings, webinars, and more - Reserve your office for free today.

name: Runway Gen-4
tagline: Our next-generation series of AI models for media generation
description: Gen-4 brings a new era of consistent, controllable media. Define your style, and the model ensures coherence across characters, locations, and objects. Maintain mood, style, and cinematography while regenerating elements from multiple angles and perspectives.

name: L(o*62).ong
tagline: Make your URL looooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooonger
description: L(o*62).ong provides a handy URL extender that lets you transform original URLs into longer ones.

name: Geocities.live
tagline: Turn any website into 90s dot-com era
description: Tired of seeing identical tailwind css/shadcn templates everywhere? Transform any webpage into GeoCities style page from 90s with a pinch of AI.

name: visionOS 2.4
tagline: Apple Intelligence arrives on Vision Pro
description: visionOS 2.4 update adds Apple Intelligence to Vision Pro, plus new Spatial Gallery and iPhone companion apps for enhanced spatial experiences.

name: SnapGrid
tagline: Collect, organise, and analyize UI screenshots
description: SnapGrid is an open-source desktop app for collecting, organizing, and analyzing UI screenshots. It uses AI to automatically detect UI components and patterns, making it a powerful tool for designers and developers.

name: Semope
tagline: Build a public help center in minutes
description: Build a powerful help center for your app with Semope. Customize your knowledge base, improve support, and reduce support ticketsâ€”all in one place.

name: SupaSleeves
tagline: The latest in technical armwear
description: Today Supabase announced their exclusive partnership with Patagonia to manufacture vibecoder SupaSleeves. These sleeves, which previously were destined for the landfill via the vest manufacturing process, are now available on the Supabase store.

name: aloSIM
tagline: Instant mobile data in 200+ countries, without roaming fees
description: Need data? Use the free aloSIM app to get instant mobile data in 200+ international destinations. Enjoy fast, unlimited internet access worldwide, and never pay roaming charges again! Starts at just $4.50/week.

name: FluxGen for Cursor
tagline: Generate AI images without breaking your code flow
description: Generate images directly in your editor using Flux by Black Forest Labs. Forget switching between apps. Create stunning visuals directly in your code editor. Perfect for developers, product creators, and technical teams who value maintaining their flow state.

name: Apex Breath
tagline: Focused breath work to increase lung capacity + performance
description: Train for your passionâ€”cold plunges, running, boxing, spearfishing, and much more. Apex Breath offers tailored breath work exercises to boost your performance in the activities you most enjoy.

name: Amazon Nova Act
tagline: Reliable AI for web automation
description: Amazon Nova Act is an AI model enabling agents to control browsers reliably. Build automations via the SDK using atomic commands, Python, & APIs.

name: Tilt-Tok
tagline: Scroll by simply tilting your phone forward or backward.
description: TiltTok is a smart, hands-free scrolling app that allows you to navigate through your feeds effortlessly. Whether you're on Instagram, YouTube Shorts, or TikTok, TiltTok empowers you to take control by just using tilt gesture.

name: Turbo Play
tagline: All in one large-scale AI-powered Audio/Video/Image editor.
description: All in one AI-powered audio/video/image/animation editor with: * Over 300 effects * Over 25 AI-powered tools * GPU Acceleration * Unique WinUI3 Interface * Auto updates

name: MenuCopy - View copied text & image
tagline: Clipboard manager in your macOS menu bar
description: MenuCopy is a clipboard manager for macOS that allows you to simultaneously view and instantly copy your most recently saved text and image from the menu bar. Designed for productivity, it keeps your clipboard history private, organized, and quickly accessible

name: Niomake
tagline: From static slides to stunning 3D experiences
description: Niomake transforms your documents into interactive and animated 3D experiences using AI and spatial computing. Create stunning presentations with avatars and interactive environments in just 3 clicks. Perfect for sales, tech B2B, onboarding, real estate & more
